attributes.action: Mark January 31 each year as Independence Day
attributes.additional_details:
Our national flag should be flown with pride across the land.
Torch light celebrations should be held at 11pm each year.
It is a day to rejoice and celebrate.
attributes.background:
We call upon HM Government to mark January 31 each year as Independence Day in our calendar.
This was the day when we formally left the EU.
It should be a day of celebration and national pride.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make January 31 a national Bank Holiday - Independence Day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332082
